summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. A man on a bicycle suddenly appears from the right side of the road and falls in front of the vehicle, causing the vehicle to stop abruptly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle had to stop abruptly to avoid hitting the man who fell from his bicycle directly in front of the vehicle. The vehicles speed decreased rapidly to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A man on a bicycle, approximately 10 meters away, suddenly falls into the vehicles path, causing the vehicle to stop abruptly.
